subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की अधिकांश भाषा क्या है?
explanation_en: Hindi is the official language of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में अधिकांश भाषा हिंदी है।

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the main source of income for Rajasthan government?
question_hi: राजस्थान के मूल पैसा क्या राजस्थान सरकार के लिए पैसा होता है।
explanation_en: Tourism is the main source of income for Rajasthan government.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के सरकार के लिए पैसा होता है।

subject: Economy
question_en: Which sector contributes the most to Rajasthan's economy?
question_hi: राजस्थान के केंद्रशास्तर्षिता के पैसा क्या क्यांदी
explanation_en: Services sector contributes the most to Rajasthan's economy.

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary revenue source of Rajasthan government?
explanation_en: Mineral resources are the primary revenue source for the Rajasthan government.

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the major source of income for the rural areas of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के काम कोणी केंकोणी केंकोणी कोणी
explanation_en: Agriculture is the major source of income for the rural areas of Rajasthan.

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the main source of revenue for the state government?
explanation_en: Mineral resources are the main source of revenue for the state government.
